title: Дядя Лёша
overview: Uncle Lesha is an ordinary janitor who works in an orphanage in a small town. At night, he robs the houses of wealthy residents, and he spends the loot for the needs of the same orphanage. His scheme fails when three of the most hooligan students accidentally catch Uncle Lesha "at work." The hero has no choice but to take the youth as his accomplices... From this moment on, Uncle Lesha's life turns into an attraction, and he has to solve a mountain of problems from his new "companions," confuse the investigation of his own crimes, regain the trust of the woman he loves, and pay for serious mistakes past, and most importantly, to implement your "Robin Hood plan" to the end. The life of his accomplices also changes - because thanks to this adventure they acquire a "fatherly figure".
